item.title: Speculative Ad-hoc Querying
item.description: SpeQL: Near-instant results for ad-hoc queries using LLMs to predict and precompute, dramatically improving user experience.

item.title: Discovering highly efficient low-weight quantum error-correcting codes with reinforcement learning
item.description: RL optimizes quantum error-correcting codes, slashing physical qubit overhead for fault-tolerant quantum computing.

item.title: TripoSG: High-Fidelity 3D Shape Synthesis using Large-Scale Rectified Flow Models
item.description: TripoSG: High-fidelity 3D shapes synthesized via large-scale rectified flow models, pushing image-to-3D generation to new heights.

item.title: Understanding and Mitigating Bottlenecks of State Space Models through the Lens of Recency and Over-smoothing
item.description: Polarizing SSMs’ state transition matrices enhances long-range dependency modeling by mitigating recency bias and over-smoothing.

item.title: Learned Compression for Compressed Learning
item.description: WaLLOC: a novel neural codec boosts compressed-domain learning by combining wavelet transforms with asymmetric autoencoders, achieving high compression ratios with minimal computation and uniform dime…
